Articles.Content: As we all know KSP2 will have all the parts from KSP. But in the KSP2 Trailer I noticed at 0:51 that the lander can 2 is the old version. Will this old version be on of the variants instead for KSP2?
Don't know, but really don't think so. A lot of the parts from KSP1 that was used for the reveal trailer is from before Squad started doing their parts revamps.

2 hours ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

As we all know KSP2 will have all the parts from KSP. But in the KSP2 Trailer I noticed at 0:51 that the lander can 2 is the old version. Will this old version be on of the variants instead for KSP2?

Don't know.
